scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n WEB,API -c blue,green "npm --workspace apps/web run dev" "npm --workspace packages/api run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace apps/web run build && npm --workspace packages/api run build
scripts.setup: npm install && npm --workspace packages/api install && npm --workspace apps/web install && npm run seed:lines && npm run seed:fleet
scripts.dev:e2e: concurrently -k -n api,web "npm run start:api:test" "npm run start:web:test"
scripts.verify: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_TEST_MODE=1 TEST_MODE=1 SEED=42 TICK_MS=500 npm run build:all && start-server-and-test dev:e2e http://localhost:3001 test:e2e
